comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Charles Allen Culberson (1855-1925) was a Teas Democrat who served as the state's Attorney General and as its Governor before being elected to the U.S. Senate in 1899. He served four terms in the Senate but lost a reelection bid in 1922. Biographical Directory of the U.S. Congress.
